title: Rob Kalin, Founder of Etsy
teaser: Host Jessica Harris speaks with Rob Kalin, the founder of Etsy, a marketplace for handmade goods. She also speaks with Marc DaCosta, the co-founder of Enigma, a company that analyzes public data.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris speaks with Rob Kalin, the founder of Etsy, a marketplace for handmade goods. She also speaks with Marc DaCosta, the co-founder of Enigma, a company that analyzes public data.
